review: Love this! I use it a lot, I fried my first one in a year though, but it's so cheap. I definitely got my money's worth. I have 3, 1 died, but i think it was a refurbished one from groupon.you can mirror you android screen (Check if you phone can support the latest version of chromecast first)  and if you install a chrome extension to your browser, you can mirror your one browser tab. It's Amazing. Forget Apple TV.I use it to watch online tv, like LOGO TV. once you sync that tab to the TV, you can open another tab and do your other work. A MAZING!!!
